showScoreExcerpt:
“Sometimes to succeed, you need to take risks. The show advertises that it is authentic and actual autistic people star in a show about autistic people. I hope that will not turn some people off. A ticket to ‘How to Dance In Ohio’ is not a risk- it has enough feel-good moments for everyone.”

Read more
